mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activity (name, description, cover_emoji, creator_id, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{coverEmoji}, #{creatorId}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM activity a INNER JOIN activity_member m ON a.id = m.activity_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, cover_emoji = #{coverEmoji}, status = #{status}, settle_time = #{settleTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as totalAmount, COUNT(*) as outcomeCount FROM outcome WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND deleted_flag = 0 AND repay_flag = 1

SELECT m.user_id as userId, u.nickname, COALESCE(paid.total, 0) as paidAmount, COALESCE(owed.total, 0) as shouldPayAmount FROM activity_member m INNER JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT payer_userid, SUM(amount) as total FROM outcome WHERE activity_id = #{activityId} AND deleted_flag = 0 AND repay_flag = 1 GROUP BY payer_userid ) paid ON m.user_id = paid.payer_userid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.user_id, SUM(o.per_amount) as total FROM outcome_participant p INNER JOIN outcome o ON p.outcome_id = o.id WHERE o.activity_id = #{activityId} AND o.deleted_flag = 0 AND o.repay_flag = 1 GROUP BY p.user_id ) owed ON m.user_id = owed.user_id WHERE m.activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.update: UPDATE activity SET creator_id = #{newCreatorId} WHERE id = #{id}
